README
========


1. In a browser, open index.html to test the functioning of the downloaded package.

2. index.html : Specifies the HTML layout of the viewer and meta-information.

3. js/object_viewer.js : Contains 3D viewer logic and JSON handler mechanisms.

4. css/style.css : Required for displaying transluscent overlay of the tip on interations.

5. docs/ : Detailed documentation of the implementation.

For any queries, please contact : pushkarparanjpe@gmail.com

Thank you for buying this product :-)

Cheers!

Pushkar
